channel.title: Headquarters for DCS World
channel.description: A mission generator for Eagle Dynamics' DCS World flight simulator.

item.title: 21 June 2019
item.description: HQ4DCS Open Beta 2 will be open source! You read that right: the next version of HQ4DCS will be open source and hosted on GitHub...
